posts.post_content:
Hi everyone. I picked these cards up separately about ten years ago and now want to sell or trade for T206. Prefer trades to sell. Willing to trade or sell individually or as a group. 

The Cards I have available are pictured. 

Gregg Broadleaf- No Creases, Sharp Corners. Clean and Crisp Back. Not great centering but a good image and highly presentable. Overall very clean. Broadleaf Fact 25 2nd VA.
 
TRADEDFisherTRADED

Miller SCD VG/EX 4. Nice, Solid looking card. 
Subgrades of 6 Surface, 6 Corners/Edges , 2 Centering.


Please see scans. Private me here for quickest response. To give you an idea of what I am looking for I am working on T206 commons in PSA5 and would love to find a rare backed card to counter the loss of the Broadleaf.

Thanks for reading my post and I hope you like my offering. I am somewhat new here but can provide references (as a buyer) and will work with people towards a satisfactory outcome.

Some higher detail scans of the ungraded cards can be seen by clicking this link-

[url]http://s1209.photobucket.com/albums/cc398/botport/Cards%20For%20Sale/[/url]
